Name: Moving with Mommy/Dancing with Daddy
Tuition: $360 if pre-paid by August 17, or ten monthly payments of $40 each (may withdraw with prorated refund at any time.)
Notes: Parent (or other adult) participates in class with child at no additional charge. No specific dress code for parent.

Name: Pre-School Dance
Tuition: $360 if pre-paid by August 18, or ten monthly payments of $40 each (may withdraw with prorated refund at any time.)
Description: Fun introduction to dance using age-appropriate music and props. This is the appropriate class for beginner 4-year-olds; 4-year-olds with dance training should register for Pre-School Ballet.

Name: Pre-School Ballet
Tuition: $360 if pre-paid by August 20, or ten monthly payments of $40 each (may withdraw with prorated refund at any time.)
Description: This class prepares students for Debut Ballet. This is the appropriate class for beginner 6-year-olds. 6-year-olds with ballet training should register for Debut Ballet.
